storyInfo: After leaving Lungmen, Ch'en finds herself thinking about how she should conduct herself. And after witnessing the travails of a 'criminal' in Columbia, she becomes that much more determined and sure of herself.

attributes.content: —Stop!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's as far as you go. You can stop running. The police will be here soon. It's all over.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What, they sent you after me too? You said you were here on some mission from Rhodes Island, that they have doctors willing to take care of the Infected. So that was all lies, eh?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Old Tom warned us not to trust any outsiders. Hah, serves me right for not listening to him. I thought you had some integrity in you, not like those idiots that only look at people as dollars and cents. ...
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: And this is what I get. Guess I'm the idiot here!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: If that's what you want to believe, suit yourself, but I'm going to tell you this whether you believe me or not: I have nothing to do with the police out there.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then leave me here and go away!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm afraid I can't do that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You threw a fit on your way to the police station, injured two guards and skipped town all in one night. With that rap sheet, I can't just let you go.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You have three squads looking for you. I just happened to find you before they did. The moment you step outside, they'll cuff you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Out of all the cops on the hunt for you, I'm the only one who knows you're innocent.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: —Of course I am!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Those assholes want my head because I talked to that foreigner dude that died on the street. Just a conversation, and they're saying I killed him! It's bullshit!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: 'Evidence of Arts use found at the crime scene. Believed to be perpetuated by Infected...' My ass! If I could do that, they would all be dead! I can't do nothing! I can't even make fire!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I can tell...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't have what it takes to kill an armed mercenary in broad daylight. That's why I'm standing here, talking to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You said you didn't kill anyone, and I believe you, but you attacked the police, injured others, and resisted arrest and ran away. You can't run away from these crimes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Stop resisting. It won't do you any good. Columbia is much better than a lot of the places I've seen. I've been to court here. You have juries, and the public is allowed to watch.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You have a chance to defend yourself, and you can tell everyone what you've been through.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It may not be much, but the Infected at least have justice here...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya, I heard Columbia is a place with a sound, well-rounded legal system. There are judges, and prisons for the Infected. I want to visit, see it with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course, Madame Ch'en, you're free to go wherever you want. Actually, I would really like to see you visit all kinds of places.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh... I guess I shouldn't call you Madame anymore?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ms. Ch'en? Huh, no need to be so respectful? But... O-Okay, then... Ch'en?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, I don't think I can. It feels awkward calling you that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahem, I digress. I don't know much about Columbia, and I'm sure you know more about its legal and criminal system than I do, so I won't go too much into that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But there is one thing that I'm sure of.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll find people antagonizing and looking down on others wherever you are and no matter the circumstances.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It can happen between the Infected and the healthy. It can also happen between the rich and the poor. Sometimes it even happens just because someone drew an arbitrary boundary...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There will always be people trying to drive a wedge between themselves and others, to set themselves apart, to raise themselves up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Please don't try to deny it just yet, Ms. Ch'en. I heard that there are a lot of Infected in Columbia. They're allowed to make a living as explorers, and some of them even got citizenship... I think there's hope in a life like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just, Ms. Chen, whether a place is good or bad is something we have to see and determine for ourselves. Ursus is a downright cruel place, but there are a lot of places that have only whitewashed their cruelty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I haven't forgotten what you said that day at the control tower, Ms. Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To treat everyone as equals and to judge everyone fairly... That's a beautiful thing, but I'm afraid it won't be easy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No one has ever walked that path, so not only is there no one to point us in the right direction, we only have ourselves to count on as we slowly forge that path for ourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm a little worried, Ms. Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm afraid you'll be disappointed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What dogshit justice is that?! In your dreams, maybe!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Who would even listen to me defend myself? Has anyone ever been taken to court who didn't end up crying a river about how they're innocent?!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: The moment they catch you, they throw you in a wooden box, like a fowl in a cage. Then, they choke you and cut open your stomach to let everyone see if you're really rotten in the inside!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You know how much money those old shitbags on the jury spend to hire people to yell on the street, 'The Infected panhandlers are mooching off the city, emptying our pockets?!'
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: What would you know? You just got here!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: No. No.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Perhaps I don't know this place that well yet, but I understand the mechanisms of state violence.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I left my country because I was disappointed in all that. I knew what exactly had gone numb or even gone rotten there.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I understand that if this power can't keep society stable, if everyone can challenge the order protected by state violence, then what will happen thereon will be far more horrifying.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's why... I can't let you run away like this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: At least not while the whole city knows a criminal is on the run, having attacked the police.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You aren't going to let me go, and I sure as hell can't beat you in a fight. Fine, guess luck's not on my side.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I'm not going to feel sorry about this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I would do the same thing even if someone else were standing where you stand right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *Spit*.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I'm not joking.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But if you are really telling the truth and you're wrongly accused, I'll do something about that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I just hope things don't really go there...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is how it is.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You're an Infected, and you don't have any money. That's all you can do.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: All the Infected who come here are either rotting away in a tin box or risking their lives in the wilderness. Everyone who can still walk is out there.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Li'l Pierre, Tom, and Dumb Mars. One by one, they were all carted away, and none of them ever came back.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You remember Old Tom? The guy who was always talking behind your back.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: How could I forget? On the first day I came to your block, he tried to dupe me into giving him the bracelet I was wearing. I taught him a lesson, but he just didn't seem to care.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: He's not above holding a grudge. We all thought you weren't gonna be able to hang around for much longer, having gotten on his bad side.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Clearly I'm not the pushover you all thought me to be.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right. It didn't take long for everyone to learn not to cross you.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You wiped the floor with Tom, but you didn't kill him. We've all wanted him to quiet down for a while
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Everyone knew he was up to no good. Stealing, conning, you name it. He's done it all. As long as it gets his granddaughter a dress or some jewelry, he's gonna do it.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: That beautiful granddaughter of hers got his money and dresses, and took the plunge with some rich guy in the city right away. And what did he get for his troubles? She told him to never step inside her house, lest he get mud all over the place.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I should've taken him in to the cops the moment I got here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right, I wanted to ask. How long has it been since the last time you saw him?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Two weeks. Maybe a little longer.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wait a minute, why are you bringing this up?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: —What happened to him?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya, if I spend my entire life looking for a place like that, a place where everyone is judged equally, to no avail...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then how should I approach those who have undeniably committed crimes but were raised in those places of injustice?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Rhodes Island can lock these men up as a temporary measure, but what will happen to them in the end?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I can hand down punishments to the evil, I can sing the praises of the good, and I can stop any unjust lynchings before they happen. I have the power to do that. There is much that I am willing to give up to achieve the justice I seek. And, to that end, I am willing to do anything.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I will still have to ask myself: Do I have the right to do that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who has the right to determine if another person is guilty?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya isn't here. I'll answer for her.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya will tell you, 'No one can judge another person.' I know she'll say that. Dr. Kal'tsit always says that, too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They're really good people. They don't lie to me. l trust them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I... I also know a group of good, big guys. We fought together and beat the bad guys. They trust me, and I trust them too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I think the things they told me are right. If you are up against a baddie who has done something wrong, and you can tell that they did, that means they are guilty. Those who are guilty should be punished.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What's bothering you, Ch'en? It's okay, you're my family now. Family should always help each other out, so I'll help you if you can't bring yourself to do it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I will stop injustice. I will stop anyone who wants to take family from anyone else.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If their crimes aren't serious enough to warrant death but someone else wants them dead, I will stop them. I will stop anyone that wants to kill, and I will punish all the bad guys. Whatever bad things they did, I will punish them the same way.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If they robbed someone else, I will beat them up. If they hurt someone, I will cut off the hand they used to hurt them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What do you think? That will take care of everything, won't it?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I will do my best to grow up to become someone who can properly determine whether a person is good or bad. I will be the judge.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What did you say—?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Tell me what you just said one more time!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Like I said—He's dead!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: He died a long time ago! The old man pissed off the wrong people, and they dragged his ass back to their place. He wasn't gonna hand them no money, so they beat his ass up before he even said anything. You know how old he was. He wasn't gonna survive more than a few days.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: He was lynched, and none of you cared?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Shit, you think any of us gives a shit about someone like Tom?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: He wanted to see his granddaughter just once, and he never got the chance before he was killed either. His granddaughter stopped talking to him long ago. All the money he scammed off people, he sent it all to her, but he never heard anything back.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I tell you, the only reason they don't bother you is cause they still have a use for you, because you can still make money! The rest of us have to watch every single word we say if we don't want to end up six feet under.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Murder is a crime, yeah, but I'll tell you this: no one's going to cross those guys all because some broke ass old man died.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: If someone really wants your head, it's not going to take them a whole lot more work than flicking away a speck of dust. They have all kinds of justifications on their side.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You hear all that noise out there? They're here for me. This is where it all ends!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You won't die. I know you didn't kill anyone. I won't stand aside if the punishment you're given is unfair. I'll help you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Easy for you to say! Look at this! How are you going to get me out this?
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: You're literally standing between me and my only way out!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: I'll find a way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Trust me. I won't let you die.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No one should be given punishment disproportionate to what they have done. If anyone thinks otherwise, they are wrong.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's why I'll right that wrong, starting right here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is the only thing I can do right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've always wondered how I should go about this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: In the beginning, I used to think that Rhodes Island's ideals were too immature and naive. Not exactly bad, but very difficult to accomplish.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But looking back, I've come to realize that I'm not actually all that different compared to you people.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya, you told me no one can ever show me the way. I think you were right. I realized that long ago, and I prepared myself for it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That said... if all I can ever rely on is my strength, my enthusiasm, and my sword, then can I only ever change that which is within reach of my sword?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wei said it again and again: no regrets.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Whether it was my trip to the core city or my decision to leave Lungmen...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I never regretted making those decisions.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Perhaps the path that Wei had arranged for me was the best option, but I didn't want to go down that route. I couldn't have. It would only torment me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm nervous.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Someone out there had told her—with actions, not words—that there are some ideals that won't ever come true even if you spend an entire lifetime working toward them. Yet even though they will never be realized, you must still work toward them.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She's right. She's gone ahead and done it, too.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I, too, will do the things that I have to do. I said this before. This isn't an ideal; it's just my job. It's something that I have a responsibility to see through.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ever since that incident, I've always wondered just what it is I'm supposed to do. I still don't have the answer. I can only do what I can, but...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm very glad that Rhodes Island is walking this path with me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, all done.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: You guys always finish your missions so quickly...! It hasn't even been a week this time, but you're all done already!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: There's a deadline on the contract; just trying to get it over with as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's amazing!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Here's your mission lists, one for each person.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And right, we've got a new hire on our team. Here's his application form. Think you can issue the credentials for him?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hm? New blood on the team?
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: It was a sudden decision, so I wasn't able to let you know ahead of time. Sorry, this is my fault.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, it's no problem. Give me a minute. I need to get a new form.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Oh, could you pass on some good news to Amiya for me?
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The prophylactics you guys promoted last time got some really good feedback. If you can manage to keep the price low enough, I think it'll find a decent footing in the market.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: If you guys can do that, I'm sure we'll send sales through the roof!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: That does sound like good news. I'm sure Amiya will be happy to hear that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If the sales volume gets any bigger, though, we'll need to deliver the medicine here straight from Rhodes Island... Hm, I'll let Amiya know right away.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, that sounds wonderful. I haven't seen Amiya in so long!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Are you two... acquainted?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We know each other pretty well! I study medicine, and I used to intern on the ship. I really missed home, though, so I talked to Dr. Kal'tsit about it, and I came back here.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: It's not bad. Once I make a little more money, I'll have saved up enough to start a clinic with my friends.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Good luck to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thanks. Don't forget, if any operators get hurt during their missions, just come to me for help. I'll patch them right up!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Alright, I guess I'll head home.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Sure, I'll walk you back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry yourself about me. I'll be alright. You be careful on the road, Ms. Ch'en!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: There was that murder that happened the other day. That was super creepy, wasn't it...? By the way, I'm not sure if you've heard, but there's actually a pretty interesting followup to the whole thing.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Everyone's talking about it. I heard they'd caught someone from the Infected zone at first, but somehow the actual killer turned himself in to the cops not even two days after that, so they ended up letting the first guy go.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: I don't buy it, though. That's definitely not the entire story.
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Why is that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well... this stays right here, Ms. Ch'en. Don't let anyone else know!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Alright, I'll keep it a secret.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I have a relative who works at the police station, so this is insider information. I heard the actual killer didn't turn himself in. A mysterious person had caught him and left him in front of the station with evidence!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Can you imagine that? Something like that happening in this day and age?
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Haha, that does sound really bizarre.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right?! I even heard the tabloids are going to give this man of mystery a name!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: The Bad Samaritan! The Punisher Outside the System! The Hero of Poetic Justice! There's so many of them, and they all sound so cool!
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: Cool? I'm not sure I agree.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: If the local police didn't catch the wrong guy, they wouldn't have needed someone else to come out and do their job.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'd rather society have no place for these vigilantes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I guess you're right...
attributes.name: Clerk

attributes.content: I've got everything packed up. Let's get going.
attributes.name: Masked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Roger that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Is that all you're bringing with you? You may not be able to bring everything, but you can still take a few souvenirs.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm good.
attributes.name: Masked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I don't have much to commemorate here.
attributes.name: Masked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's better if I start all over...
attributes.name: Masked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's go, then.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya, I know there will be lots of difficulties on the way there, and I am bound to be disappointed in all sorts of things.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I also know that I won't stop. I will keep charging down my path.
attributes.name: Ch'en
